title: How to Tank a Belt for Mining

steps.headline: Acquire a battlecruiser or some other good ratting ship.
steps.description: You will not want to destroy the rats though, so fit the ship for sheer tanking power.

steps.headline: Go to a belt rich in minerals.
steps.description: Mercoxit, Crokite, and Bistot are always miner magnets.

steps.headline: Let all the belt rats lock onto you and fire.
steps.description: If you cannot stand the stress, get away.

steps.headline: Wait until  all the rats are attacking you, bring miners into the belt.
steps.description: You can advertise the belt in Local, Alliance, Corp, or any chat channel.

steps.headline: Take their fire and do not harm the rats.
steps.description: They will respawn and attack your miners.

steps.headline: Note that once the miners have finished, collect your cut.
steps.description: You will need to negotiate this with the miners. Once the miners are all gone, kill the rats if possible.

text: Acquire a battlecruiser or some other good ratting ship. You will not want to destroy the rats though, so fit the ship for sheer tanking power. Go to a belt rich in minerals. Mercoxit, Crokite, and Bistot are always miner magnets. Let all the belt rats lock onto you and fire. If you cannot stand the stress, get away. Wait until  all the rats are attacking you, bring miners into the belt. You can advertise the belt in Local, Alliance, Corp, or any chat channel. Take their fire and do not harm the rats. They will respawn and attack your miners. Note that once the miners have finished, collect your cut. You will need to negotiate this with the miners. Once the miners are all gone, kill the rats if possible.
